nplcit.text: Hoffman HG. Virtual-Reality Therapy. (2004) Scientific American pp. 58-65 (Retrieved 7 April 2014) [Retrieved online from www.sciam.com]
DeAngelis, T. A Second Life for Practice? (March 2012) American Psychological Association Vol 43, No. 3 pp. 48 [Retrieved 7 April 2014) [Retrieved online from www.apa.org]
Linden R. Second Life Education. Linden Labs (version 8 November 2010) (Retrieved 7 April 2014) [Retrieved online from http://wiki.secondlife.com]

abstract.p: A virtual counseling practice. The practice enables a counselor trained to provide counseling to a patient to hold counseling sessions within a virtual reality world. A counseling server, a counseling application, and a counseling database, supplement the patient and counselor session in the virtual world. The counseling application provides communication tools. The communication tools supplement the counseling section through heightening of feelings, emotions, and other patient information during the session.

A virtual counseling practice. The practice enables a counselor trained to provide counseling to a patient to hold counseling sessions within a virtual reality world. A counseling server, a counseling application, and a counseling database, supplement the patient and counselor session in the virtual world. The counseling application provides communication tools. The communication tools supplement the counseling section through heightening of feelings, emotions, and other patient information during the session.

L'invention concerne une méthode de consultation virtuelle qui permet à un consultant formé pour donner des consultations à un patient de tenir des séances de consultation dans un monde virtuel. Un serveur de consultation, une application de consultation et une base de données de consultation complètent la séance de consultation dans le monde virtuel. L'application de consultation fournit des outils de communication. Ces outils de communication complètent la section de consultation en renforçant les sentiments, les émotions et d'autres données sur le patient pendant la séance.
